chat.settings.context_count.tip: The number of previous messages to keep in the context.
chat.settings.max_tokens.tip: The maximum number of tokens the model can generate. Normal chat suggests 500-800. Short text generation suggests 800-2000. Code generation suggests 2000-3600. Long text generation suggests above 4000.
chat.settings.temperature.tip: Higher values make the model more creative and unpredictable, while lower values make it more deterministic and precise.
chat.settings.top_p.tip: Default value is 1, the smaller the value, the less variety in the answers, the easier to understand, the larger the value, the larger the range of the AI's vocabulary, the more diverse

render.title: Render Error
render.description: Failed to render formula. Please check if the formula format is correct

http.400: Request failed. Please check if the request parameters are correct. If you have changed the model settings, please reset them to the default settings
http.401: Authentication failed. Please check if your API key is correct
http.403: Access denied. Please check if your account is verified, or contact the service provider for more information
http.404: Model not found or request path is incorrect
http.429: Too many requests. Please try again later
http.500: Server error. Please try again later
http.502: Gateway error. Please try again later
http.503: Service unavailable. Please try again later
http.504: Gateway timeout. Please try again later

knowledge.title: Knowledge Base
knowledge.notes_placeholder: Enter additional information or context for this knowledge base...
knowledge.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this knowledge base?
knowledge.not_support: Knowledge base database engine updated, the knowledge base will no longer be supported, please create a new knowledge base
knowledge.no_provider: Knowledge base model provider is not set, the knowledge base will no longer be supported, please create a new knowledge base
knowledge.document_count_help: The more documents requested, the more information is included, but the more tokens are consumed
knowledge.chunk_size_tooltip: Split documents into chunks, each chunk size, not exceeding model context limit
knowledge.chunk_overlap_tooltip: The amount of duplicate content between adjacent chunks, ensuring that the chunks are still contextually related, improving the overall effect of processing long text
knowledge.chunk_size_change_warning: Chunk size and overlap size changes only apply to new content
knowledge.chunk_size_too_large: Chunk size cannot exceed model context limit ({{max_context}})
